sentences.sContent: Has Anyone Ever Filed an immigrant Visa Petition on Your Behalf?
sentences.sContent_eng: Has Anyone Ever Filed an immigrant Visa Petition on Your Behalf?
sentences.sCn: 以前有人代表你的提出移民签证的申请么?。

sentences.sContent: But "the hostile part can be mobilized from time to time, " by what he calls "anti-immigrant entrepreneurs.
sentences.sContent_eng: But "the hostile part can be mobilized from time to time, " by what he calls "anti-immigrant entrepreneurs.
sentences.sCn: 但是“敌对的那部分可能会不时地动员”，以他称之为“反移民企业家”的名义。

remMethod.val: im(在…内)+migr(移动)+ant(表人)→向内迁移的人→移民， 侨民

trans.tranOther: someone who enters another country to live there permanently
